name: death-cab-for-cutie-is-coming-to-town-lightning-100-swoops-down-to-save-us-from-ticketmaster
title: Death Cab For Cutie Is Coming To Town; Lightning 100 Swoops In To Save Us From Ticketmaster
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
First of all, you probably need to know that Death Cab For Cutie is playing The Ryman on May 4th with Matt Costa and Ra Ra Riot.

Now that we’ve cleared that up, here’s the scoop – We all hate the ticketbuying process, especially when it involves Ticketmaster, right? Save yourself the hassle (and get tickets before they go on sale to the general public) and visit Lightning 100 tomorrow at 10am for an exclusive presale password and link. Tickets are $32.00 and if for some reason you miss the Lightning 100 presale, they open to the general public on Friday at 10am (ticket link here).

Photo by mahgegan?.
